item.title: vue处理树型显示表格序号问题
item.author: liuzongtang@outlook.com (刘宗堂)
item.description: ## 使用element ui 的`:tree-props`展示树形结构 ![image](https://cdn.staticaly.com/gh/JohntunLiu/PicX@main/images/image.yomze2ynhk0.webp) ```html <!-- 列表 --> <el-table v-loading="loading" :data="list" row-key="appOrderNo" default-expand-all :tree-props="{children: 'children'}" > <el-table-column type="index" label="序号" width="55" prop="parentIndex"> <template
item.dc:creator: 刘宗堂
